subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etyl}}
{{Han compound|其|月|t2=moon|ls=psc|c1=p|c2=s}} – changing moon marks the passage of time, hence a period of time.

subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# {{†}} to [[arrange]] a [[time]]; to [[engage]]; to arrange to [[meet]]
# {{†}} to [[meet]]; to [[gather]]
# {{†}} to [[hope]]; to [[wish]]; to [[expect]]
# {{†}} [[predetermined]] [[time]]; [[scheduled]] time
# {{†}} [[date]]; specific [[day]]
# [[period]] of [[time]]; [[stage]]
# {{zh-classifier|periods of time or [[stages]] of a project}}
# {{†}} [[time limit]]
# {{†}} [[good]] [[fortune]]; [[chance]]
